services
Class EventService

java.lang.Object
  services.EventService

public class EventService
extends java.lang.Object

This service provides the API for (Event Manager) as described in the MobiSoc paper/documentation. Due to restrictions imposed by KSOAP on the type of dataobects that can be exchanged, for ceratin methods we provide two versions of the API. One that works with KSOAP and the other one works generally. If we do not provide a specific KSOAP version, then the method works with KSOAP as well as in the general case. The parameters that guide event service such as the frequency of checking location constraints can be changed in the class definition. The parameters are preset to optimal values.

Author:
Maverick

Method Detail

registerEvent

public void registerEvent(Event X)
This API registers the given event with the event dispatcher.

Parameters:
X - Event to be registered

registerEvent

public java.lang.String registerEvent(KVMEvent X)
This is a KSOAP compatible wrapper for the Main API. It registers the given event with the event dispatcher.

Parameters:
X - KVM event to be registered

deleteEvent

public void deleteEvent(java.lang.Long eventId)
This API deletes the event from the event dispatcher.

Parameters:
eventId - Event Id of the event to be deleted

retrieveEvent

public Event retrieveEvent(java.lang.Long eventId)
Returns an event stored in the event dispatcher. Note that we do not provide a KSOAP wrapper for this API as it is an auxiliary API. A wrapper can be provided on demand.

Parameters:
eventId - Event Id of the event to be returned
Returns:
Event details for the event contained in Event and CBTrigger class

retieveUserEvents

public java.util.ArrayList retieveUserEvents(java.lang.Long userId)
This API returns events stored for a particular user. Note that we do not provide a KSOAP wrapper for this API as it is an auxiliary API. A wrapper can be provided on demand.

Parameters:
userId - User Id for the user whose events are returned
Returns:
ArrayList of user events contained in Event and CBTrigger classes

getAlerts

public KVMAlerts getAlerts(java.lang.Long userId)
This API returns an object contaning fired events for the user

Parameters:
userId - User Id for the user for which alerts are to be fetched
Returns:
An object (KVMAlerts) that contains all the fired events for the user
